column4: you know sanmarcos, ubuntu is perhaps the ultimate newbie friendly forum/irc channel I have seen...
obviously yes, but when you ask questions of a more advanced nature, you are stuck in a low signal-to-noise ratio, as in not many experts around here
now if there was a way for me to get paid, sure I would answer and provide extensive help..
you are right .. that is perhaps what frustrates a couple of people .. they are not exactly 'newbies' .. they have a specific problem that requires a specific solution ..
